## ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Getting Started

You need [Python 3.11](https://python.org/downloads) or later to run Interlinked. Run `pip3 install apple-interlinked -U -i https://pypi.apple.com/simple`.

Then import `AI` using:
````python
from interlinked import AI

observation = AI.ask(prompt='what is your name?')
print(observation.response)

# Hi! My name is Interlinked.
````

[Documentation](https://quip-apple.com/ElRgAaaTbxmi) | [Examples](https://github.pie.apple.com/Interlinked/interlinked/tree/main/examples).

Looking for AI Screener, Talk to Your Documentation, and more? [Learn more](PLATFORM.md).

## üíª Contributing

We love collaborating and greatly appreciate contributions! The repository is open to everyone at Apple to contribute. If you have a particular area you're interested in contributing to, please let us know and we'll do our best to assist!

## üõü Help & Questions

If you have any questions, we're here to help! Whether it's a platform, library, or workflow-specific question, please reach out to [#help-interlinked](https://slack.com/app_redirect?channel=help-interlinked) on Slack.

**Found a bug?** Please file a radar to `Interlinked | New Bugs`.
